author: potuz
content:
I am incredibly stupid that I forgot to mention this discrepancy between Francesco's document and what I will open in the CL spec: 

I do not want to change the attestation type. So when a validator attests for a block root R, it fixes the whole ancestry of R, regardless if R is empty or full, This is different in Francesco's doc cause in Francesco's doc, if the attestation is for a slot higher than the one that R was included in, then the attestation should decide between R full or R empty. I am not making this difference, this is to not change the attestation type and to not use the PTC of the slot of R to decide this. This way the change to the spec is actually minimal since the current forkchoice already behaves exactly as I am describing.
